CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV , MOT and CHI enter the room . MOT is holding CHI in her arms
INV explains warm-up task to MOT
<bef> MOT puts CHI on the floor
MOT sits on the floor . <aft> MOT looks at her watch
CHI reaches out and gets the ball
CHI bends down to pick up the football
CHI turns the ball over in her hands
MOT waits for CHI to throw the ball
CHI turns the ball around in her hands and then tries to throw the ball
CHI looks around at the toys on the floor
<5-6> MOT holds ball up to show CHI
CHI stretches her arm to take the ball
MOT hands the ball to CHI
CHI swings her body around while speaking
CHI swings open arms swinging the football in her right hand as though playing football
<aft> CHI looks down at the floor
<aft> CHI turns and looks at the chair behind her
<aft> CHI puts the ball on the chair
MOT points to the teddy bear on the chair
CHI holds ball out toward MOT and then holds it over her own head
CHI throws the ball to MOT forcefully
CHI walks towards the toys on the floor
CHI points to the jack+in+the+box on the floor
CHI picks up the truck and plays with it
MOT rolls the truck back to CHI's feet
CHI points to jack+in+the+box on floor
MOT holds jack+in+the+box steady for CHI
CHI squats on the floor next to the jack+in+the+box
CHI turns the handle on jack+in+the+box
the handle gets stuck and the CHI cannot turn it any longer
CHI stands up and stares down at the jack+in+the+box
CHI bounces up and down in frustration
CHI squats down and reaches for the handle
MOT and CHI turn the handle together until jack pops up
CHI pushes the jack back down in its box
CHI looks around at the other toys
CHI touches her mouth while speaking
CHI points to the duck she is holding
CHI squeezes the duck and shakes it
CHI looks away from duck toward floor
MOT puts duck down on top of jack+in+the+box
CHI looks around trying to locate the ball
CHI takes the ball from MOT
<1-3> CHI waves the ball around and then puts it on the floor
CHI falls down on the ground to show MOT
CHI picks up the duck that was standing on top of the jack+in+the+box
CHI holds the duck up for MOT to see
aft CHI stands up and moves restlessly
CHI wriggles around on the spot
CHI falls down and then gets up and walks across the room
CHI fiddles briefly with jack+in+the+box then gets up and walks over to football
CHI walks over to the table
CHI walks over to the chair
CHI sets the ball down on the chair
CHI waves the ball around in the air
CHI throws the ball on the ground
CHI runs over to the ball and picks it up
CHI holds the football in front of MOT
MOT extends her hands and looks at CHI
CHI throws the football to MOT
CHI swings arms back and forth
MOT hands the ball to CHI
<aft> CHI turns slightly away from MOT and looks down at floor
CHI walks back over to MOT and stands very close to her
CHI pulls MOT's face close to her
CHI looks at the book on the floor
CHI starts to walk to the book
INV leaves room Small Scale Activity takes place and re- enters at 14:59:15
INV explains Forbidden Object task to MOT and has her sit next to CHI at table
<bef> MOT picks up a toy off of the table
MOT holds the toy in front of CHI
INV takes the object out of the drawer
CHI glances at MOT and then watches INV
INV picks up the toy with one hand
MOT holds the toy in front of CHI
in picking up the toys INV drops a toy on CHI's lap
MOT retrieves the toy and gives it to INV
INV hands the brush toy to CHI
<aft> MOT puts the object on the table and sets it in motion
MOT holds toy out to CHI and looks at CHI
<bef> CHI looks at the object . CHI looks down at the toy
CHI takes the toy from MOT and squeezes it
CHI holds the toy and squeezes it for MOT
CHI wriggles around uncomfortably in the chair
CHI holds out hand for MOT to tickle while CHI stares at Forbidden Object
<2> MOT strokes CHI hand with brush
CHI stares at the Forbidden Object
CHI looks down at her foot
CHI puts out foot for MOT
CHI looks up at INV blankly
MOT tickles CHI foot under the table
CHI smiles and looks up at INV
INV puts the object back in the drawer
INV tells MOT about Parent Child Interaction boxes INV picks up toys from Small Scale Activity
MOT gets up and walks over to the table
MOT brings the box down to the floor
CHI reaches into the box and takes out the ball
CHI holds up the ball while facing MOT
MOT is kneeling on the floor
MOT opens out her legs and reaches out her arms waiting to receive the ball
CHI kneels down and sits in a position identical to MOT
CHI prepares to receive the ball
CHI holds ball up in the air ready to bounce it
CHI throws the ball to MOT forcefully so that it bounces
CHI swings arms around and looks around the room
MOT slowly rolls the ball to CHI
CHI doesn't really pay attention and instead looks around at the walls of the room
CHI pushes ball with her knees
CHI looks at MOT wriggling restlessly
CHI walks over the box and stands ready to drop the ball into it
CHI throws the ball into the box
CHI walks away from the box
CHI walks over to the box and takes the ball out of the box
CHI holds the ball in her hands and bends down to drop it into the box
CHI drops ball into the box
CHI wanders around swinging her arms
<bef> MOT takes ball out of box . MOT gets the CHI's attention by bouncing the ball near CHI
CHI turns and looks at the ball
CHI comes to take the ball from MOT
CHI takes the ball and tries to bounce the ball on the floor
the ball hits the waste basket and makes a loud noise
CHI points to the waste basket
CHI shakes her arms and fingers while looking at MOT
CHI runs over to pick up the ball
as the CHI tries to pick the ball up she keeps knocking it against the waste basket
MOT moves the box nearer to CHI
CHI drops the ball into the box
MOT gets up and puts the box back onto the table
MOT puts the box down on the floor
CHI stands next to box watching MOT
<aft> MOT lifts off the lid of the box
CHI squats down next to the box
CHI stands facing MOT holding the towel
CHI covers her head with the towel
CHI drops one side of the towel
CHI holds the towel out to MOT
MOT covers her head with the towel
CHI reaches out her arm and pulls the towel from MOT's head
CHI stands facing MOT holding the towel
CHI covers MOT's hand with the towel
CHI takes towel from MOT hand
CHI walks over the towel aimlessly
MOT picks up the towel from the floor
CHI looks at the towel that MOT holds up
<bef> MOT covers the chair with the towel
CHI stands near MOT holding the towel
CHI hands MOT the towel and walks over to the box
MOT folds the towel on the floor
MOT puts the lid back on the box
MOT goes over to the table and puts the ball box away
MOT brings the other box down to the floor
MOT returns other box to the table and puts another box on the floor
CHI comes over to the box
CHI holds the lid as she speaks
MOT picks up a piece of paper and shows it to CHI
MOT sits on the floor and lifts up a piece of paper to show the CHI
CHI bends down to pick something out of the box
CHI squats and draws on the paper
MOT holds paper still for CHI
CHI sits on the paper and looks around and stares at the chair
CHI touches the leg of the chair nearby
MOT tries to regain CHI attention
MOT leans over to try to make eye contact with CHI
CHI stands watching MOT who is drawing
<aft> MOT draws a circle on paper
MOT sits up and looks at CHI
MOT picks up the red crayon
CHI puts down the crayon she was drawing with
CHI puts her crayon in the box
MOT picks up a different crayon
CHI goes over to the table
CHI goes over to the chair and holds the crayon over it ready to write on it
CHI turns and looks at MOT
CHI turns and shows MOT the crayon
CHI puts the crayon on the chair
CHI looks at MOT's drawing then looks around the floor
CHI climbs onto the large chair
MOT puts the crayons in the box
End of PCI - Crayons and Paper
MOT reaches out to take the crayon from CHI
MOT points to crayon on chair
MOT points to crayon on chair
CHI picks crayon up and drops it into the box
MOT puts the paper in the box
CHI turns and begins climbing onto chair
MOT gets up and puts the box on the table
MOT brings the last box down to the floor
CHI looks over her shoulder at MOT
MOT begins to open the box
<bef> MOT lifts up the cover of the box rapidly
CHI watches MOT and motions to the box
CHI slides off chair and comes over to MOT
MOT holds book out to CHI
CHI reaches out and takes the book
CHI sits down with the book
CHI sits down and opens book
CHI points to a picture of bears in the book
MOT leans over CHI shoulder to look
MOT points to picture in the book
CHI turns the pages in the book
MOT helps CHI open the book
CHI turns book over in her hands and then reopens it
the sound of a door slamming shut is heard in the background
MOT points to a picture in the book
CHI leans over book with body
MOT turns the pages in the book
MOT turns the pages in the book
MOT closes the book and picks it up to look at the cover
CHI hops on the spot watching MOT
MOT points to the front cover of the book
CHI runs over to the book
CHI points to bunny on the cover of the book
CHI climbs onto the chair and looks at the boxes on the table
CHI points to the desk with the boxes on it
MOT looks over CHI's shoulder at the table
CHI bumps her arm on table
MOT reaches out to pick up CHI
CHI points to table with the boxes on it
MOT puts the cover on the box
